snippet: STANLEY--Ted. The Fountain House community and our members, who have been profoundly impacted by Ted and Vada's extraordinary generosity, extend our deep condolences to the Stanley family for its loss. Initially motivated by his son's bipolar disorder, Ted's unparalleled contributions to scientific research improved and extended the lives of countless people with mental illness everywhere. His altruism, advocacy and compassion represent a legacy to be forever respected and cherished. With gratitude and sympathy The Fountain House Board of Directors and President Kenneth J. Dudek 1/3
